short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline pipeline growth workflows by bringing Gong Engage into Salesforce and your reps’ Gmail inboxes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gong Anywhere streamlines pipeline growth by integrating Gong Engage into Salesforce and your reps' Gmail inboxes. It brings the power of Gong, with its data-driven insights based on customer interactions, and enterprise-level security, into revenue team workflows to save them time.

Gong for Gmail

🟣 Tracking: Track email performance, including open and click-through rates, to monitor buying signals and follow up at the right time.
🟣 Templates & blocks: Easily browse and apply your Gong Engage templates and blocks to save time, increase reply rates, and move deals forward.
🟣 Rephraser: Get AI-generated rephrasing suggestions while writing emails.
🟣 Do not contact: Look for the red dot on the contact icon next to someone’s name in Gmail so you know that person is marked as “do not contact” in Gong. 

Gong for Salesforce

🟣 Add people to Gong Engage flows: Add contacts directly to Gong Engage flows without leaving Salesforce.

Gong for Gmail and Gong for Salesforce

🟣 See when someone is a contact or lead in Gong: Get visual indications in Gmail and Salesforce when someone is logged as a contact or lead in Gong.
🟣 Contact view: Get full context on your contacts to multi-thread more effectively and update CRM fields on the spot.
🟣 Ask anything: Ask open-ended questions and receive instant insights about contacts powered by Gong AI.

Stay tuned for more upcoming features that bring the power of Gong to you, elevating your sales productivity wherever you go. 

To enable this extension, you need an Engage license. To start using it, sign in to Gmail and Salesforce with the email address you use with Gong.
